item.title: Bio
item.description: Building websites and working on computers has been a hobby of mine for about 20 years now. My web design skills are limited but as you can see I am able to code them. I would like to attend college and further educate myself in web design and pursue certifications for IT work. In my free time I play computer games and experiment with various Linux distributions.

item.title: Games
item.description: Here are some screenshots of me playing WoW Classic. The UI you see in the screenshots is ElvUI.

item.title: Home
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.

item.title: Software
item.description: As far as browsers go Mozilla Firefox, I recommend Mozilla Firefox. There are allot of debates but Mozilla is more concerned about user privacy than Google. Pre-installed browsers like Edge and IE are often targetted because they are pre-installed with Windows.Check it out Nowadays, not many people still use a email client on there computer but if you Bluemail is pretty awesome. They support pretty much every email service there is and almost every platform.
